title: Salesforce SMTS | Atlassian P40 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech NIT
Years of Experience: 6
Prior Experience: MNC. Impacted by Layoff (> 6 months)
Previous Compensation: ~61L (Base + variable + RSUs)

Offers: 
**Salesforce**
Date of the Offers: Sept '24
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 53L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 65K USD
Bonus: 15% (7.95 L)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~74.5L
Benefits: Standard
Other details: Still in Verbal Stage, trying to negotiate
Team: Marketing Cloud org

Any other scope of negotiation here?

**Atlassian**
Date of the Offers: Sept '24
Company: Atlassian
Title/Level: P40
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 47.45L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 6L
Stock bonus: ~60K USD
Bonus: 15% ( ~7.11 L)
Employer PF contribution: 2.27L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Pf): ~69.3L + 6L (First year)
Benefits: Standard
Team: Enterprise Trust Org

Trying to negotiate at Salesforce for further push on RSUs, they seem to be a big time lowball.

Which should be the ideal choice here, depending on WLB, learning opportunity?
How is Marketing Cloud as an organization?
How are increments at both Atlassian and Salesforce?

Few points i am considering:

1. Atlassian will offer refreshers RSUs as well (Not sure of the ranges), which would be missing at Salesforce.

2. Would be pushing for P40 -> P50 at atlassian in next 2-3 years(if feasible). Wont be possible for a promo anytime soon at Salesforce for LMTS i feel.

3. Salesforce has recently switched to 3 days a week WFO mandate as well.

4. How are Bonus payouts at both Atlassian and Salesforce? On a "Meets Expectation" rating, would it be 15%, or it would be awarded only in the case of exceptional performance?

Any inputs would be helpful

Other offers: 
https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5752010/Goldman-Sachs-or-VP-or-Bangalore

https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5752019/Wayfair-or-L3-or-Bangalore

Will be updating the interview experiences soon!

title: Fintech Startup Offer
content:
Education: Btech (Tier2 College) NIT
Years of Experience: 7+
Company: Fintech Startup
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Gurugram
Salary: 56lpa
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4lpa + 4lpa(one time retention)
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 64lpa (1st year) -> fron next year back to 56lpa
Benefits: Standard benefits
Other details: 
Previous CTC - 51lpa 

I know it is a low ball offer, but the HR is not ready to negotiate. But given the current job market, is it the right decision to change my current org (it is a service based) and i want to switch to a product based as soon as possible. 

Or should i wait for other offers? I also feel gurugram offers less than banglore do, are there enough opportunities available in the market? Shall i accept this offer and try other companies within the notice period?
salaryTotal: : 64lpa (1st Year) -> Fron Next Year Back To 56lpa
